Package com.mygdx.othello.models

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.othello.models.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a board of the game Othello

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean AI
      Boolean indicating if AI mode is ON or not
      private int boardSize
      The width and/or height of the board
      private java.util.ArrayList<Cell> cells
      ArrayList of all cells on the board
      private java.util.ArrayList<Cell> cellsToFlip
      Variable used to store the last cells effectively flipped
      private int playerTurn
      Player turn
      private com.badlogic.gdx.Preferences prefs
      Preferences of the game
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> score
      Score
      private java.util.ArrayList<Cell> tempFlips1
      Variable used to memorize the cells to flip after the checking of a player's legal moves
      private java.util.ArrayList<Cell> tempFlips2
      Variable used to memorize the cells to flip after the checking of a player's legal moves
      private float timeBlack
      Time left for black player in Timed Mode
      private float timeWhite
      Time left for white player in Time Mode
      private int totalBoardSize
      Number of cells on the board

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Board​(int boardSize, boolean AI)
      Creates a board of boardSize x boardSize dimensions The board is represented by an ArrayList of Cells, each cell taking a value among {0,1,2} according to its state. 0 : if the cell is empty ; 1 : if a player 1's pown is on it, etc...
      Board​(GameData gameData)
      Constructor used to load an already saved party Creates a board of boardSize x boardSize dimensions The board is represented by an ArrayList of Cells, each cell taking a value among {0,1,2} according to its state. 0 : if the cell is empty ; 1 : if a player 1's pown is on it, etc...

      private boolean checkDiagonalLeft​(Cell c, int player)
      Check if putting a powns in this cell will lead to a legal along the left diagonal Also fills the tempFlips variable with the cell to flip
      private boolean checkDiagonalRight​(Cell c, int player)

      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
      private Cell moveDown​(Cell c)
      Returns the cell below c on the board If the working cell is on the last row (no cell below) : returns null
      private Cell moveDownLeft​(Cell c)
      Returns the cell at the bottom left of c on the board Returns null if no cell can answer the query
      private Cell moveDownRight​(Cell c)
      Returns the cell at the bottom right of c on the board Returns null if no cell can answer the query
      private Cell moveLeft​(Cell c)
      Return the Cell just before c in terms of 'absolute' position If the working cell is the first cell of the row (no cell on the left) : return null
      private Cell moveRight​(Cell c)
      Returns the Cell just after c in terms of 'absolute' position If the working cell is the last cell on the row (no cell on the right) : returns null
      private Cell moveUp​(Cell c)
      Returns the Cell above c on the board If the working cell is on the first row (no cell on the top) : returns null
      private Cell moveUpLeft​(Cell c)
      Returns the cell at the top left of c on the board Returns null if no cell can answer the query
      private Cell moveUpRight​(Cell c)
      Returns the cell at the top right of c on the board Returns null if no cell can answer the query
      boolean placeDisc​(int pos, int player, java.util.Map<Cell,java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> legalMoves)
      Places a disc at the designated position 'pos' if the move is legal Returns true if a disc is placed, return false if not

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board​(int boardSize,
             boolean AI)
        Creates a board of boardSize x boardSize dimensions The board is represented by an ArrayList of Cells, each cell taking a value among {0,1,2} according to its state. 0 : if the cell is empty ; 1 : if a player 1's pown is on it, etc...
        Parameters:
        boardSize - , width and/or height of the board
        AI - , a boolean indicating if the game is played versus an AI or not

      • Board

        public Board​(GameData gameData)
        Constructor used to load an already saved party Creates a board of boardSize x boardSize dimensions The board is represented by an ArrayList of Cells, each cell taking a value among {0,1,2} according to its state. 0 : if the cell is empty ; 1 : if a player 1's pown is on it, etc...
        Parameters:
        gameData - , load a GamaData instance containing all major information on a game

      • checkHorizontal

        private boolean checkHorizontal​(Cell c,
                                int player)
        Check if putting a powns in this cell will lead to a legal move horizontally-wise Also fills the tempFlips variable with the cell to flip
        Parameters:
        c - , a potential position for the active player's pown
        player - , int representing the opposing player
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if this position will lead to a legal move horizontally-wise

      • getLegalMoves

        public java.util.Map<Cell,java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> getLegalMoves​(int player)
        Returns all the legal moves the active player can do
        Parameters:
        player - , the active player
        Returns:
        an HashMap>, mapping a potential new cell for the active player to all the opposing player's cells to flip

      • placeDisc

        public boolean placeDisc​(int pos,
                         int player,
                         java.util.Map<Cell,java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> legalMoves)
        Places a disc at the designated position 'pos' if the move is legal Returns true if a disc is placed, return false if not
        Parameters:
        pos - , the desired 'absolute' position
        player - , the active player number
        legalMoves - , an HashMap with the legal moves as the keySet (Set) and the Cells to flip as the mapped values.
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if a disc is placed, false in the other case
